price: (5) In the victory of Allāh.[1141] He gives victory to whom He wills, and He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
arabic: بِنَصۡرِ ٱللَّهِۚ يَنصُرُ مَن يَشَآءُۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
footnotes: [1141]- i.e., the victory given by Allāh to a people of the Scripture (Christians) over the Magians of Persia.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: binaṣri al-lahi yanṣuru man yashāu wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-raḥīmu
